name: Chhota Rajan
criminalrecord: Chhota Rajan, whose real name is Rajendra Nikhalje, is a former member of Dawood Ibrahim’s gang who later broke away and formed his own gang. He was one of India’s most wanted fugitives until his arrest in 2015 in Indonesia. He is believed to have been involved in multiple murders, including the murder of journalist Jyotirmoy Dey in 2011.
